course_description: Emphasis is on long term support of the critically ill patient requiring ECMO and VAD management & other perfusion supports needed to manage the complex patient. Students will apply knowledge of the patient's disease/condition when deciding the best extracorporeal set up for management.
prerequisites: CVP 585 prerequisite and CVP 611 co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
